text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Congratulations on supporting a man who has (with your and the @GOP ‘s greed and lust for money and power )denied the CORONAVIRUS reality , called it a hoax , delayed action , and caused death and suffering.Instead of elevating this megalomaniac you should worry about humanity .
